provenance: Joel Itman, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1994.
text: Like the Surface Series from "Currents," the Features Series screenprints were based on unique newspaper collages that Rauschenberg produced in September 1969 as part of an exhibition project at Dayton's Gallery 12, one of Minneapolis's leading contemporary art galleries at the time. There are 18 prints in each series.
title: Features from Currents 58
